items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

beer.beer_name: Supra American IPA (雪堡 美式IPA)
beer.beer_description: This wonderful SUPRA IPA is in a strong American west coast style. The hops are selected by brewed masters every season to maintain the best flavor. The result is fantastic beer with multiple strong tropical fruit aroma and bitterness.

beer.beer_description: Pearl River Draft Beer is produced under advanced low-temperature membrane filtration system and sterile packagingsystem, which help maintain the mellowness, freshness and nourishment of fresh draft beer. The first bottle of Pearl River Draft Beer was launched in 1997.

beer.beer_description: Cantonese lager imported from China. This is an export strength version of Pearl River 12°.

brewery.brewery_name: Pearl River Beer Group (珠江啤酒集团)

beer.beer_description: A special unique fermented fruity beer. Pure American cranberry juice, European hops, and Chinese honey are perfect combined. The first taste is almost sour, a rush of honey giving way to a smooth sensation with just enough sweet backbone.
